** Description

Paytm karo!

** Flag

~prism{Buffalo_buffalo_Buffalo_buffalo_buffalo_buffalo_Buffalo_buffalo}~

* Solution

1. make a 33x33 square (1 to 1089)
2. darken every number in the list
